service.title: igraph community detection service
service.author: Ayato Shimada
service.description: Collection of services detecting communities for a given network

parameters.name: palette
parameters.description: Name of color code for painting in Cytoscape

parameters.name: weights
parameters.description: name of an edge attribute or a list containing edge weights.

parameters.name: initial
parameters.description: name of a vertex attribute or a list containing the initial vertex labels.

parameters.name: fixed
parameters.description: a list of booleans for each vertex. True corresponds to vertices whose labeling should not change during the algorithm.

input.label: in_net
input.description: Input network to be used for community detection algorithms

output.label: out_net
output.description: Community membership list stored as node and edge attributes
